name: MUI, Ant and Bootstrap live components - select, customize, insert, get code
description:
Discover the power of designing with live React components in FigmaGet your own live UI


  1. Click on Component Library in Anima plugin menu
  2. Select, customize, and insert your components
  3. Preview component code


See how your Figma design turns into an interactive, responsive UI

  1. Select the frame you want to see live
  2. Click Preview in the Anima plugin
